content.question: For what value of <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, if any, is <math alttext="y equals, e raised to the 2 x power, plus k times e raised to the negative 3 x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> a solution to the differential equation <math alttext="4 y, minus y double prime, equals, 10 times e raised to the negative 3 x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: There is no such value of <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.G: Confirm that solutions are accurate and appropriate.
